Text:
Hey thanks for the great releases.  I'm hopeless at syncing these myself so it's really appreciated.

Is there any chance of doing the transformer movies?
@deadmeat238 Thanks. There are already some good quality syncs of the Transformers movies around so I wasn't intending on doing them.
This is not a real Riff. It's also painfully unfunny.
@wtaf It's a RiffTrax Presents sold from the main site and I clearly labeled who was on it.
